Here you can edit all information about this word. You can edit the word, the definition or the quotation. Now close this one and open the second tutorial.
Tutorial 2 - How to add a word?
Add a new word manually – click on the «+ » button to add a word you want to save. You can add the definition or quotations.

Add a new word from the Internet – do a long press on the word you want to save and simply add it to Prof Lama.Not sure on how to to this? You can also watch the video tutorial on the Google Play page of Prof Lama.
